bibl.title: The Alexandria Library in History.

series.title: Centre for Hellenic Studies. King's College London. Publications.

bibl.note: The role played in history by the ancient Library of Alexandria, and the ideals which have inspired the new Alexandria Library.
bibl.seg: EL-ABBADI Mostafa, The Alexandria Library in History.
Anthony HIRST and Michael SILK (Edd.), Alexandria, Real and Imagined = Centre for Hellenic Studies. King's College London. Publications. 5 (Aldershot, 2004) pp. 167-183.
The role played in history by the ancient Library of Alexandria, and the ideals which have inspired the new Alexandria Library.
